about_description: a young developer passionate about building solid, scalable digital solutions with engaging interfaces. I'm currently completing the Academlo bootcamp, specializing in React, TailwindCSS, Motion, Node.js, Express.js, NestJS, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL, with a constant focus on learning and refining my skills to build high-impact products.
